channel.description: It's all spinning wheels & self-doubt until the first pot of coffee.

item.title: 2025 Week 17
item.description: <html><head></head><body>TL;DR: Another week, another weeknotes post. Talking about web components, Fastmail cleanup, garden irrigation, Revision 2025, and some other random crap! Someday, I'll figure out how to make these summaries more exciting!</body></html>
